016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.streams;
017
018
019import com.eventstore.dbclient.EventStoreDBClient;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObjects;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObject;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.EventStoreRels;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.EventStoreService;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ReactiveStreamsServer;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationFeature;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
029import jakarta.inject.Inject;
030import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
031import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
032
033@Service
034@RunLevel(6)
035public class EventStoreStreamsService {
036
037    @Inject
038    public EventStoreStreamsService(EventStoreService eventStoreService,
039                                    ServiceResourceObjects serviceResourceObjects,
040                                    Configuration configuration,
041                                    ReactiveStreamsServer reactiveStreams) {
042        ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper()
043                .findAndRegisterModules()
044                .disable(DeserializationFeature.FAIL_ON_UNKNOWN_PROPERTIES);
045
046        ServiceResourceObject.Builder builder = new ServiceResourceObject.Builder(new InstanceConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("instance")), "eventstore")
047                .api(EventStoreRels.eventstore.name(), "api/eventstore");
048
049        EventStoreDBClient client = eventStoreService.getClient();
050
051        StreamsConfiguration streamsConfiguration = new StreamsConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("eventstore.streams"));
052
053        // Read
054        if (streamsConfiguration.isPublisherEnabled()) {
055            builder.publisher("eventstore");
056            reactiveStreams.publisher("eventstore", cfg -> new EventStorePublisher(client, objectMapper, cfg), EventStorePublisher.class);
057        }
058
059        // Write
060        if (streamsConfiguration.isSubscriberEnabled()) {
061            builder.subscriber("eventstore");
062            reactiveStreams.subscriber("eventstore", cfg -> new EventStoreSubscriber(client, cfg), EventStoreSubscriber.class);
063        }
064
065        ServiceResourceObject sro = builder.build();
066        serviceResourceObjects.add(sro);
067    }
068}
